  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cdd3fc-664c-4188-27c8-e539e14b33a6#1#8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A székesegyház környékén</string>
            <string language="en">chatedral nearby</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chatedral nahe gelegenes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voisin chatedral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">próximo chatedral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vicino chatedral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">chatedral κοντινός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">próximo chatedral</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A pécsi székesegyház környékének ókeresztény emlékei</string>
            <string language="en">paleochristian memories of the nearby chatedral in Pécs</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ókeresztény művészet,  temetkezés,  sírkamrák,  Kr.u. 1-4. század,  Pannónia,  </string>
            <string language="en">paleochristian art, making graves, burial vaults, 1st-4th century A.D. Pannonia</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">paleochristian Speicher vom nahe gelegenen 
chatedral in Pécs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mémoires paleochristian du chatedral voisin dans 
Pécs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">memórias paleochristian do chatedral próximo em
Pécs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">memorie paleochristian al del chatedral vicino in
Pécs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">paleochristian μνήμες κοντινού του chatedral σε 
Pιcs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">memorias paleochristian del chatedral próximo en
Pécs</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die paleochristian kunst, Gräber, Beerdigung bildend 
vaults, 1.-. Jahrhundert A.D. Pannonia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art paleochristian, faisant des tombes, enterrement 
saute, le 1er-4ème siècle A.D. Pannonia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a arte paleochristian, fazendo sepulturas, enterro 
vaults, 1o-ô século A.D. Pannonia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'arte paleochristian, facente le tombe, sepoltura 
vaults, primo-quarto secolo A.D. Pannonia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">paleochristian τέχνη, που κάνει τους τάφους, υπόγειοι 
θάλαμοι ενταφιασμών, 1$ος-4$ος αιώνας Μ.Χ. Pannonia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el arte paleochristian, haciendo los sepulcros, 
entierro salta, 1ro-ô siglo A.D. Pannonia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0

end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>

              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
